front.title: An Interactive Voice Response (IVR) Control Package for the Media Control Channel Framework

abstract.t: This document defines a Media Control Channel Framework Package for Interactive Voice Response (IVR) dialog interaction on media connections and conferences. The package defines dialog management elements for preparing, starting and terminating dialog interactions, as well as associated responses and notifications. While other dialog types can be used, this package defines a specific IVR dialog type supporting prompt playback, runtime controls, DTMF collect and media recording. The package also defines elements for auditing package capabilities and dialogs.
